user_auth.views module

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

This method will be used to authenticate user credentials through the backend if user does not exist register page is loaded, if credentials are authenticated user is logged in and directed to homepage

Returns

HttpResponseRedirect to redirect to url

Return type

class

user_auth.views.logout_view(request)[source]

This method will be used to logout logged in user and to request the login page template

Returns

render for login.html

Return type

function

user_auth.views.register(request)[source]

This method will be used to register new user credentials through the backend and log user in. User is then directed to homepage

Returns

HttpResponseRedirect to redirect to url

Return type

class

This method will be used to request the login page template

Returns

render for login.html

Return type

function

This method will be used to request the registration page template
